summary: pretty sweet my picky cat loves the grass i put them next to a south facing window in the apartment and they have been growing well even during the winter the grains that do grow are pretty hearty just dont expect more than 60 of the seed to grow. If you cat is very inquisitive i suggest placing them in a location that is hard to reach i found out the hard way thank god i found this food.
too rich for my dog gave her black poo. i think the liver content is too high for an every day food. cesar filet mignon is truly a great dog food best food for sensitive tummies.

i like these these are actually very tasty pure potatoes with a great texture and no nasty filler stuff no bacon no cheesejust tasty potatoes they cook well in either the oven or microwave i add a touch of either salt pepper or fajita seasoning to spice it up i rated 4 out of 5 stars because they could be a bit bigger portion however this item is a fairly good value for the money spicy thai chips totally orgasmic these chips are the best spicy chip i have ever tasted signed

stale tea i had the same experience as the previous reviewer the tea was stale i was hoping after reading hisher review that their experience was just a fluke and that i would receive usable tea i was wrongi now have a pound of tea i have no use for tried to contact customer service but they asked me a single question and never responded again highly disappointed excellent.

best fat free hot chocolate i was so excited when i found amazon selling the nestle hot chocolate we used to purchase it at our local stores but they only carried it seasonally and then this last year they quite carrying it altogether it was very disappointing it is a far better product than the swiss miss diet hot chocolate as someone who does weight watchers it also works great with my diet as one beverage is no points.

big nut bar planters big nut bars roasted triple nut 81ounce boxes pack of 10 there are five 5 bars per individual box so fifty bars total if you like nuts you will like these. There is 7 grams of protein and 6 grams of carbs they are a fast food for on the run when not able to set down and eat right.

i would eat these by choice not because i have to great healthy product auto ship price better yet we love all of the mestemacher breads ruined me for the lighter white breads for life they keep unopened for months and they are mega hearty and satisfying when you do open them just keep refrigerated great toasted just toast them twice to get the crunchy factor used to travel to a specialty market to find them till i discovered them on amazon prime where we have 3

very healthy satisfying as most write on ezekiel you need to develop a palette for unprocessed foods to enjoy it i would describe this cereal as tasting like grapenuts but the granules are smaller so doesnt hurt your teeth i usually eat with vanilla almond milk a little stevia sweetener and a sliced banana for breakfast or i sprinkle over yogurt often i add a tablespoon of organic oat bran to either highly recommend.

Cinnamon hermits have a very unique taste so its hard to compare them with something else but the main characteristics are soft slightly moist texture juxtaposed by a light coating of crunchy granular sugar. The 6pack has the absolute lowest pricepercookie that ive been able to find anywhere single packages at grocery stores run between 475595 and 2160 free shipping.

chipotle tabasco sauce how do i love thee i love this stuff imagine my joy to find it in a gallon sized container buying as many 5oz bottles is 64im going to buy this and keep the small bottles and fill them up again oh happy day put it on eggs hot wings in soups and stews beans on tacos in potato salad let your imagination run wild.
